weaknesses: Heavily reliant on ultimate for initiation
Can be kited by mobile champions

counterItems.name: Thornmail
counterItems.description: Reflects damage and applies Grievous Wounds, countering Briar's healing

counterItems.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
counterItems.description: Provides team-wide shield against Briar's burst damage

counterItems.name: Frozen Heart
counterItems.description: Reduces attack speed, limiting Briar's damage output

strategies.title: Kite and Disengage
strategies.description: Choose mobile champions and maintain distance to kite Briar effectively
tips: Use champions like Vayne, Ezreal, or Kai'Sa
Save mobility spells for when Briar engages
Maintain proper spacing during laning phase

strategies.title: Control During Blood Frenzy
strategies.description: Apply hard CC when Briar activates Blood Frenzy (W)
tips: Save CC abilities for when Briar uses W
Use displacement abilities to disrupt her positioning

strategies.title: Counter Ultimate
strategies.description: Avoid or counter Briar's ultimate engagement
tips: Keep track of Briar's ultimate cooldown
Use Flash or mobility spells to dodge Sleep Dart
